info.name: Mr. Clement POS API
info.description: A comprehensive Postman collection for the Mr. Clement POS and Backend API, generated from markdown documentation.

item.name: Auth & User Management
item.description: APIs for user authentication, registration, and management.

item.name: Merchant (Client) Services
item.description: Base URL: /api/v1/admin/clients. All endpoints require authentication.

item.name: Payment Services
item.description: Base URL: /api/v1/payments. All endpoints require authentication.
